DocAttribute.Name: UMultiplicities
DocAttribute.Documentation: The multiplicities of the knots in the _u_ parameter direction.

DocAttribute.Name: VMultiplicities
DocAttribute.Documentation: The multiplicities of the knots in the _v_ parameter direction.

DocAttribute.Name: UKnots
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of the distinct knots in the _u_ parameter direction.

DocAttribute.Name: VKnots
DocAttribute.Documentation: The list of the distinct knots in the _v_ parameter direction.

DocAttribute.Name: KnotSpec
DocAttribute.Documentation: The description of the knot type.

DocAttribute.Name: KnotVUpper
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of distinct knots in the _v_ parameter direction.

DocAttribute.Name: KnotUUpper
DocAttribute.Documentation: The number of distinct knots in the _u_ parameter direction.

DocWhereRule.Name: UDirectionConstraints
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The function returns TRUE when the parameter constraints are verified for the _u_ direction.
DocWhereRule.Expression: IfcConstraintsParamBSpline ( SELF\IfcBSplineSurface.UDegree, KnotUUpper, SELF\IfcBSplineSurface.UUpper, UMultiplicities, UKnots)

DocWhereRule.Name: VDirectionConstraints
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The function returns TRUE when the parameter constraints are verified for the _v_ direction.
DocWhereRule.Expression: IfcConstraintsParamBSpline ( SELF\IfcBSplineSurface.VDegree, KnotVUpper, SELF\IfcBSplineSurface.VUpper, VMultiplicities, VKnots)

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingULists
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of _UMultiplicities_ shall be the same as the number of _UKnots_.

DocWhereRule.Name: CorrespondingVLists
DocWhereRule.Documentation: The number of _VMultiplicities_ shall be the same as the number of _VKnots_.
